Changelog
=========

1.2.1 (2012-11-09)
------------------

- Uploading only one webm file is now working
  [andreas_stocker]

1.2.0 (2011-10-11)
------------------

- Fixed fullscreen mode in VideoJS
  [andreas_stocker]
- Support for adding FLV files
  [andreas_stocker]

1.1.0 (2011-10-09)
------------------

- Added support for youtube videos
  [andreas_stocker]

1.0.0 (2010-03-27)
------------------

- Initial version (not public)
  [andreas_stocker]
